channel.title: Software development communnity
channel.description: A forum for a software development community

item.title: Site presentation
item.description:
Site presentation.
Day for presentation. Our project was to create a community portal for an organization, including a news feed, events, member lists and discussion forums.

item.title: Site launch
item.description:
Site launch.
Day for site launch. We will see if it is possible to host the site on freeasphosting.net
